title: [EUW] [Plat+] Team Looking For a Top Laner & a Mid Laner!
body:
Greetings!

We are looking for ambitious League players whom wants to put in effort, time and their competitive spirit and attitude into this game!
We expect you to have at least reached high Platinum ranking in the previous season. We are looking forward to play regularly during the weekdays and participate in Tournaments in the weekends. We obviously require you to have a decent microphone and the time needed to make this work! As voice comms we are using Discord, and we would prefer you to be atleast 18 years old and able to communicate in english without a problem.
If you are intrested in trying out you can add me in-game in the EUW region by the names of "xâyN" and "Pecueca" if you have any questions or concerns about our team.

A little bit about me:
My Name is Leo
I'm 20 years old and I'mm from Germany
I hit Diamond 4 Last season playing ADC/support.
I am an ADC Main right now, and will be playing the ADC role in the team.
I played with a Team before and participated in several tournaments and weekly League competitions.

See you in the Summoner's Rift!

Best Regards,
Pecueca

replies.body:
Ich bin atm nur Gold 1, war aber last Season Platin. Ich bin Midlaner und auf jeden Fall interessiert. Bin aber erst 15 und werde in 5 Monaten 16.
Bei Interesse einfach adden und anschreiben :)
